text: Barry McGuire (born October 15, 1935) is an American singer. == Overview == === The New Christy Minstrels === McGuire's career started out as a member of The New Christy Minstrels. === Solo === McGuire has also performed as a solo artist. One of his most famous solo songs is the 1966 song "Eve of Destruction". title: Barry McGuire
